burger.name: CRISPY CHICKEN
burger.description: This burger features a breaded and fried chicken breast served on a soft bun with lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.

burger.name: ULTIMATE BACON
burger.description: This burger is a meat-lover's dream come true. It features a juicy beef patty topped with crispy bacon, melted cheddar.

burger.name: SMOKEY HOUSE
burger.description: This burger is all about the smoky flavor. It features a beef patty cooked over an open flame and topped with smoked bacon.

burger.name: TURKEY BURGER
burger.description: Burger is a healthier option for those who want to enjoy a burger without guilt. It features a ground turkey patty seasoned.

drink.name: SOFT DRINK
drink.description: Classic soft drinks like Coca-Cola, Pepsi, Sprite, and Fanta are a popular choice at fast food restaurants.

drink.name: MILKSHAKE
drink.description: Thick and creamy milkshakes made with ice cream and milk are a popular beverage option at fast food restaurants.

drink.name: ICED TEA
drink.description: Iced tea is a popular alternative to soda and is a refreshing and healthy option.

drink.name: LEMONADE
drink.description: Lemonade is a sweet and tangy beverage made by combining lemon juice, sugar, and water.

drink.name: SMOOTHIES
drink.description: Smoothies are a healthy and delicious beverage option that are made by blending fruit, yogurt, and ice together.

drink.name: COFFEE
drink.description: Coffee is a popular choice for those who need a quick caffeine boost in the morning or afternoon.

testimonial.name: Darrrell Steward
testimonial.description: The Fastos is my favorite fast food chain. The burgers are juicy and flavorful, the fries are crispy, and the milkshakes are the perfect treat. It's the perfect place to indulge in some guilty pleasure fast food.

testimonial.name: Darlene Robertson
testimonial.description: I have been a regular customer at the Fastos for years and it never disappoints. The food is consistently delicious and the service is always friendly and efficient. It's my go-to spot for a quick and satisfying meal.

testimonial.name: Courtney Henry
testimonial.description: I recently tried the plant-based burger at the Fast Food place and was blown away by how tasty it was. I appreciate that they offer options for vegetarians and vegans, and the quality of their plant-based options is top-notch.

service.name: Convenient Food
service.description: We understand that our customers are busy and on-the-go, so we make it a priority to provide fast and convenient food options.

service.name: Dine-in or Takeout
service.description: We offer both dine-in and takeout services for our customers. If you're in a rush or just prefer to enjoy your meal at home, our takeout service is perfect for you.

service.name: Delivery Service
service.description: We also offer delivery service for our customers who prefer to have their food delivered directly to their doorstep.

service.name: Catering Services
service.description: Our catering menu includes a variety of options to choose from and we'll work with you to create a customized menu that meets your specific needs.

service.name: Special Offers
service.description: We love to reward our loyal customers, which is why we offer special offers and promotions throughout the year.

service.name: Online Ordering
service.description: With just a few clicks, you can easily place your order and have it ready for pickup or delivery.
